vue.format.wrapLineLength.desc: Maximum amount of characters per line (0 = disable).
vue.format.unformatted.desc: List of tags, comma separated, that shouldn't be reformatted. 'null' defaults to all tags listed at https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/dom.html#phrasing-content.
vue.format.contentUnformatted.desc: List of tags, comma separated, where the content shouldn't be reformatted. 'null' defaults to the 'pre' tag.
vue.format.preserveNewLines.desc: Whether existing line breaks before elements should be preserved. Only works before elements, not inside tags or for text.
vue.format.maxPreserveNewLines.desc: Maximum number of line breaks to be preserved in one chunk. Use 'null' for unlimited.
vue.format.extraLiners.desc: List of tags, comma separated, that should have an extra newline before them. 'null' defaults to "head, body, /html".
vue.format.wrapAttributes.auto: Wrap attributes only when line length is exceeded.
vue.format.wrapAttributes.forcealign: Wrap each attribute except first and keep aligned.
vue.suggest.html5.desc: Configures if the built-in HTML language support suggests HTML5 tags, properties and values.
vue.trace.server.desc: Traces the communication between VS Code and the HTML language server.
vue.validate.scripts: Configures if the built-in HTML language support validates embedded scripts.
vue.validate.styles: Configures if the built-in HTML language support validates embedded styles.
